Industrial Architectural & Engineering Design : we are specialized in designing and planning of industrial buildings or infrastructure. When it comes to planning, we have to ensure quality standards to make sure it is safely built for production or human use. Industrial architects are responsible for the design and planning of the following: warehouses, factories ,processing plants and much more.

Project Management : Project management is the process of leading the work of a team to achieve all project goals within given constraints. This information is usually described in the project documentation created at the beginning of the development process. The primary constraints are scope, time and budget. We manage and provide consultancy for all aspects of the company's industrial architectural design.

Interior Design : Interior design is a multifaceted profession that involves conceptual development, space planning, site inspection, programming, research, communication with a project's stakeholders, construction management and design execution and we undertake corporate and industrial interior design.

Adroit Grow Private limited founded by Mr. Manish Bhatnagar, a Civil Engineer with vast experience of 20+ years executing Industrial, Commercial & Interior Spaces. In his career, He has executed 150+ projects successfully with more than 70 Industrial projects in IMT Manesar itself. With a deep knowledge of technical know-how of Civil, HVAC, Plumbing, Electrical, Solar, PEB Structures and farsightedness, he is an expert of Project Management of handling multiple projects at a time. He has done projects for a mix of clients including Japanese Multinationals, Indian Conglomerates, SMEs, Automobile ancillaries, Garment manufacturing Units, Plastic Injection Molding Factories, Engineering Industries and specialized in the Tire Industry. Passionate about his work and each site, Energetic, People- Centric, his experience and insights are taking Adroit Grow to newer heights.
Adroit Grow provides a single window one-stop solution to their customer with an emphasis on cost control & value additions by utilizing current Technologies & hands-on industrial experience.
